comment: Very scatterbrained. Lost ALOT of papers Couldn't remember what she said The previous class. Don't take her unless you have to.

She is very scatterbrained! The class consists of mostly lectures (extremely boring) and occasional group work. Some outside work and a decent size group project at the end. I wouldn't take her unless you had to.

The class material was very interesting. Ms. Whitney however doesn't want any conflict. She cuts off the discussion when it turns to race.  She is so forgetful. The student needs to track their points very carefully because the teacher forgets what assignments count for a grade. I was extremely confused as what was due and when it was due!

She is a super sweet lady, but very scatter brained. She also give out a ton of big assignments. At the beginning of the semester she said she wasn't going to give us a bunch of big assignments because she knows how it is and that most of us have jobs and don't have time. Well that did not happen. It was like every week she assigned something else!
Very Enthusiastic! Easy A, but you still take alot away from the class!
